spouse.lowhearts.greeting/1: There you are. Where did you go? You never tell me anything anymore.
spouse.lowhearts.greeting/2: Are you going to say hi to me this time?
spouse.lowhearts.greeting/3: Um, hi! I still exist, you know!
spouse.lowhearts.greeting/4: %1$s, are you ignoring me on purpose?
spouse.lowhearts.greeting/5: I'm starting to feel like you don't pay attention to me.
